summary: A collection of command‑line utilities that load various public datasets, transform them into formats suitable for language‑model fine‑tuning or reward‑model training (e.g., prompt‑completion or preference pairs), optionally tokenize the text, and support parallel processing and publishing to the Hugging Face Hub.
business_intent: Streamline the creation and sharing of high‑quality training data for LLM development and alignment, reducing engineering effort for researchers and product teams building or improving language models.
